I have been a software engineer for the last 6+ years and am very familiar with recruiters reaching out for "the next best thing". Unfortunately most of these recruiters are more focused on getting their commission than finding the right fit for me as a candidate and for the recruiting client.John is definitely the exception to the norm. I have stayed in touch with John even after I took on new roles at different companies. summary: Full-stack developer of interactive projects for the web and mobile platform.My goal is to be a very versatile developer. I strive to learn as many languages as possible, applying and adding newly learned concepts to my skill set. My focus is on products that are not bound to any platform. Responsive websites, cross platform mobile apps and using the cloud for data storage help me achieve this.Visit my portfolio for my most recent work http://tobiasartz.com/Specialties: Developing all aspects of an interactive project (front-end and back-end)Languages: PHP (CodeIgniter, CakePHP, Laravel, Yii, Symfony2), HTML5, CSS (SASS, LESS), GoLang,Java (Android), Javascript (Vue, Angular, Backbone, Dart, NodeJS, Angular, Backbone, Mocha, Karma), WebGL (Three.js), Objective-C, Actionscript 3 (AIR, Away3D), MySQL
